page.title: 13TRADE
page.content: SATURDAY IS SHOPPING DAY.MOM,DAD,ME AND MY SISTER USE THE GROSVENOR.WE ALWAYS WALK THERE.WE HAVE A GOOD SELECTION FROM SAINSBURY'S,PREEDY'S,WIMBUSH,BEJAM FOSTER'S AND WIGFALL'S.SOMETIMES IT IS SO FULL IN SAINSBURY'S YOU CAN'T MOVE! MY FAVOURITE SHOP IS PREEDY'S.IT SELLS ALL SORT OF STATIONERY,SWEETS,WHICH I LIKE VERY MUCH,NEWSPAPERS,BOOKS,TOYS, ALSO CARDS AND NOVELTIES.WE BUY MOST OF OUR FOOD FROM SAINSBURY'S SUPERMARKET WHICH HAS MOVED TO ITS NEW AND BIGGER SITE 2 YEARS AGO,FROZEN FOOD FROM BEJAM CAKES FROM WIMBUSH AND CLOTHES FROM FOSTERS.IN THIS CENTRE,WE HAVE:1 DRY CLEANERS,2 DRUG STORES,1BUILDING SOC IETY,1 FLORIST,1 SEWING CENTRE,2 SHOE SHOPS,2 BUTCHERS,3 NEWSAGENTS,1 FREEZER CENTRE,1 TOY SHOP,2 ELECTRICAL,6 CLOTH ES,2 FANCY GOODS,2 KIOSKS,1 FURNITURE, 1 TRAVEL AGENT,1 PUB & SAINSBURY'S.
